PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04962020-06-25TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Various Amendments)
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (VARIOUS AMENDMENTS) in order to (1) reduce the number of long-standing exemptions from certain requirements; (2) enhance consistency in the use of terminology; (3) eliminate redundant requirements; (4) enhance the alignment of regulatory requirements with International Civil Aviation Organization standards; and (5) improve consistency between the English and the French versions of regulatory requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0151 Publication Date: 2020-07-08
AttachmentsAttachment
